title: AloeAloe
text:
AloeAloe Medical and Scientific Writing

       

  AloeAloe  Medical and Scientific Writing





  
 

Hi, I’m Claire!
I’m a UK-based Freelance Medical and Scientific Writer with over 3 years of experience in Medical Communications and a passion for learning.
Contact me for support with your medical, commercial and medical education deliverables.


 
  
   
  
    
     Email
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  






I can support you to…

Create marked-up reference packs
Data check content

Develop scientific materials, including… ⤵

Advisory board reports and executive summaries
Congress materials (abstracts, booth content, intelligence reports, posters, presentations…)
Internal training materials
Meeting-in-a-box deliverables
Newsletters
Slide decks for in-field and internal use
Symposium and stand-alone meeting materials (presentations, agendas, invitations, briefing documents, e-blasts…)


Interpret meaning from data
Link content in Veeva Vault
Re-template materials
Review word copy



Tools I am familiar with…

Microsoft Office
PubMed
Veeva Vault



Therapy areas of expertise…

Dermatology
Hepatology
Rare disease
Rheumatology
